page.title: 06ABBOT'S HILL SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Gemma. I an a boarder at Abbot's HIll School. In the morning we have breakfast at 7.20 am. At 8.20 am. we have to be in our form room to have the register taken. Then we have chapel, in which we sing a hymn and pray. As it's Friday we have got French first, followed by PE and History, then it's break. For break we have orange or lemon juice and two biscuits. THen we have a double period of Science followed by Geography. After that we have lunch, and the next lessons begin at 2.10 pm. We have Maths, Music and double Games. In Games we play rounders or tennis or we go swimming. Next it's Prep., then supper. We go to bed at 8.15 pm.
